review_data.title: Unique concept
review_data.content: Amazing atmosphere, unique concept in Zurich (and really well put together) and the staff will for sure make you feel at home. No comments about food, just superb. 100% recommended. A Zurich's must!

review_data.title: Veneto-style Italian
review_data.content: Cicchetteria da Rosa is a newly opened Italian restaurant next to Hirschenplatz in central Zürich. The restaurant/bar has an open kitchen and a nice selection of Italian tapas. They also have a variety of pasta. The paprika pulpo was my favourite dish we had.
